issue.title: [Docs][Python] Add more info about the change in PyArrow C++ API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should add a not to the documentation: <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/python/integration/extending.html#c-api>

explaining that the location of the PyArrow C++ header files and arrow_python lib has changed and that the users need to use the information from the Integration -> Extending page to get the new location.
